events.name: Demons, Monsters, and Pagans: The True Story of Christmas
events.description: Lecture by @SalemWitchWiles-- Thomas Vallor of TST Salem

events.name: Satanic Chef
events.description: Feast as Chef Adam teaches you how to make sumptuous parmigiana.

events.name: How to Make a Deal With the Devil
events.description: Special presentation by Shiva Honey. What makes an effective ritual? What key elements should be present in order to get your desired results? In this talk, Shiva will share some of the secrets she has uncovered over her years of ritual study and practice that will have you more grounded in your power and confident in your ability to shape your world in the New Year.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, a bat from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats! Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Late Night Library: Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.
